title: Mister Whiskers: my favourite nursery rhymes
creator_credit: Lindesay Dresden, Elizabeth Antheunis, Franciscus Henri and Franciscus Henri Productions
brief_description: Join Mr Whiskers and his dog Smiggy in their garden for 48 of your favourite nursery rhymes. Including the following classics: Rock a bye baby; Here we go round the mulberry bush; Baa Baa black sheep; Hickory dickory dock; Hey diddle diddle; Three blind mice; Rub a dub dub; Miss Polly had a dolly; and, Three blind mice. Includes two bonus songs: Mister Whiskers monkey business and Clapping Land from the animated, ‘Hello Mister Whiskers’.
